tasks.title: Project Setup with NextJS and TailwindCSS
tasks.description: Initialize the project with NextJS and integrate TailwindCSS for styling.
tasks.details: Set up a new NextJS project using the App Directory structure. Integrate TailwindCSS for styling by following the official TailwindCSS setup guide for NextJS. Ensure ShadUI components are available for use.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the project builds successfully and TailwindCSS styles are applied correctly to a sample component.

tasks.title: Supabase Local Setup and Database Schema
tasks.description: Set up a local instance of Supabase and define the initial database schema for chat messages and sessions.
tasks.details: Install Supabase CLI and initialize a local instance. Create tables for 'Chat Message' and 'Chat Session' as per the data models provided in the PRD. Use SQL migrations to manage schema changes.
tasks.testStrategy: Run Supabase locally and ensure tables are created correctly. Test basic CRUD operations on the tables.

tasks.title: Basic UI Layout and Components
tasks.description: Develop the basic UI layout using React components and TailwindCSS.
tasks.details: Create React components for the chat interface, including input areas, message display, and mode toggle. Use TailwindCSS for styling and ensure components are responsive.
tasks.testStrategy: Render the UI components in a browser and verify layout and responsiveness across different screen sizes.

tasks.title: Text Chat Implementation with OpenAI Integration
tasks.description: Implement the text chat functionality using OpenAI's GPT-4.1-nano model with streaming responses.
tasks.details: Integrate OpenAI's API for text generation. Use the streaming API to display responses in real-time. Implement server components in NextJS to handle API requests and responses.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the chat functionality by sending messages and verifying real-time streaming of AI responses.

tasks.title: Streaming Response Rendering
tasks.description: Render AI responses in real-time as they are received from the OpenAI API.
tasks.details: Use React state management to update the UI with incoming tokens from the OpenAI streaming API. Ensure smooth and continuous display of text as it is generated.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate various response lengths and verify that the text streams smoothly without delays or interruptions.

tasks.title: Supabase Database Integration for Message Storage
tasks.description: Integrate Supabase to store chat messages and sessions.
tasks.details: Implement API calls to store and retrieve chat messages and sessions in Supabase. Ensure that each message is stored with the correct metadata as defined in the data models.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that messages are correctly stored and retrieved from the database. Check data integrity and consistency.

tasks.title: Image Generation Mode with Toggle
tasks.description: Add the ability to switch between text chat and image generation modes using OpenAI's gpt-image-1 model.
tasks.details: Implement a UI toggle to switch modes. Integrate OpenAI's image generation API and handle requests and responses for image generation. Display generated images in the chat interface.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the mode toggle functionality and verify that images are generated and displayed correctly when in image mode.

tasks.title: New Chat Functionality
tasks.description: Implement the 'New Chat' feature to start fresh conversations and store previous chats.
tasks.details: Add functionality to clear the current chat and reset the interface. Store previous chat sessions in Supabase with appropriate metadata.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the 'New Chat' button to ensure it clears the interface and stores the previous session correctly.

tasks.title: Error Handling and Feedback Mechanisms
tasks.description: Implement error handling and user feedback for API interactions and UI operations.
tasks.details: Add error handling for API rate limits and network issues. Provide user feedback through UI notifications or alerts when errors occur.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate API errors and verify that appropriate error messages are displayed to the user.

tasks.title: UI Enhancements and Cross-Browser Compatibility
tasks.description: Enhance the UI for improved styling and ensure compatibility across different browsers.
tasks.details: Refine UI components for better aesthetics and usability. Test the application on major browsers to ensure consistent behavior and appearance.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct cross-browser testing on Chrome, Firefox, and Safari to verify consistent UI and functionality.
